thread.title: Falcons CB attempted a shamelessly awful flop
thread.title_full: Falcons CB attempted a shamelessly awful flop

title: Falcons CB attempted a shamelessly awful flop
text:
Falcons CB attempted a shamelessly awful flop And the Oscar goes to ... Post to Facebook Falcons CB attempted a shamelessly awful flop And the Oscar goes to ...  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/falcons-robert-alford-flop-aaron-rodgers-packers-nfc-nfl-playoffs/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Falcons CB attempted a shamelessly awful flop Andrew Joseph 6:28 p.m. ET Jan. 22, 2017 20 Shares 
Screenshot (Photo: Twitter) 
Aaron Rodgers was called for an offensive facemask penalty in a fourth quarter touchdown drive, but after the play, NFL fans were treated to an all-time bad flop from the Falcons' Robert Alford. 
Watch Alford as Rodgers lightly bumps into him. The Falcons cornerback went tumbling backwards into an official. This flop has me dying pic.twitter.com/9qnKyAyRxR — CJ Fogler (@cjzero) January 22, 2017 
And another view. — Vikings Blogger (@firstandskol) January 22, 2017 
If this was the NBA, Alford could probably expect a $5,000 fine. And no, it didn't draw a call. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/falcons-robert-alford-flop-aaron-rodgers-packers-nfc-nfl-playoffs/ Most Popular
